body:
It seems related to "Introduce flex-list & flex-item elements for Gitea UI #25790"

@denyskon do you have ideas about it?
@wxiaoguang / @ExplodingDragon Can you explain? Is it about the Mandarin (?) characters which have to be horizontal?
Neither Chinese nor English should be wrapped/horizontal IMO.

issue.body:
Fix #26617

1. Separate the "flex-list" examples into a dedicated template, and add some more examples
2. Use `flex-basis` instead of `flex-shrink` for `flex-item-trailing`, to avoid wrapping the texts too aggressively
3. Some `flex-wrap: wrap;` are removed, see the screenshot

### Screenshot for 1

<details>

![image](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/assets/2114189/173c725b-d786-46ee-9eed-897a3a58fef3)

![image](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/assets/2114189/682da3ae-1cac-4d10-8374-accf0d7b6964)

</details>

###  Screenshot for 2

<details>

![image](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/assets/2114189/6c95cfce-35ec-408c-aa45-43de6dafa632)

![image](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/assets/2114189/f01c726d-faee-464e-858f-81eed361cf9c)

![image](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/assets/2114189/05f6de65-57c0-4d25-b3bf-b3b67e7324ab)

![image](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/assets/2114189/fd062362-9a9c-4239-92e3-3952728081fc)

</details>

###  Screenshot for 3
